what_you_do: Beth Badour is an author and creator who focuses on empowering individuals living with kidney disease through her books, artwork, and courses.
who_you_serve: Beth serves individuals dealing with kidney disease, as well as those seeking personal empowerment and transformation in their lives.
signature_programs: Never Say Never: Living life with kidney disease from Victim to victorious, Never Say Never Workbook, What Brand of Kidney Beans?: My Love Letter to You
bio: Featured as a keynote on Million Lives Transformed in May 2023.
business_focus: Beth Badour is an author and creator who focuses on empowering individuals living with kidney disease through her books, artwork, and courses. (kidney disease support)
